## Discussion

If [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], incrementing beyond [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIStepper/maximumValue] sets [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIStepper/value] to [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIStepper/minimumValue]; likewise, decrementing below [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIStepper/minimumValue] sets [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIStepper/value] to [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIStepper/maximumValue]. If [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false], the stepper doesn’t increment beyond [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIStepper/maximumValue] nor does it decrement below [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIStepper/minimumValue] but rather holds at those values.

The default value for this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

# wraps

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that determines whether the stepper can wrap its value to the minimum or maximum value when incrementing and decrementing the value.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var wraps: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

If [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], incrementing beyond [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIStepper/maximumValue] sets [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIStepper/value] to [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIStepper/minimumValue]; likewise, decrementing below [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIStepper/minimumValue] sets [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIStepper/value] to [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIStepper/maximumValue]. If [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false], the stepper doesn’t increment beyond [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIStepper/maximumValue] nor does it decrement below [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIStepper/minimumValue] but rather holds at those values.

The default value for this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Configuring the stepper

- **isContinuous**: A Boolean value that determines whether to send value changes during user interaction or after user interaction ends.
- **autorepeat**: A Boolean value that determines whether to repeatedly change the stepper’s value as the user presses and holds a stepper button.
- **minimumValue**: The lowest possible numeric value for the stepper.
- **maximumValue**: The highest possible numeric value for the stepper.
- **stepValue**: The step, or increment, value for the stepper.
